articles.title: Clare County Council approves Zimmer Biomet expansion plans
articles.description: Clare County Council has approved plans for an expansion to the Zimmer Biomet Ltd facility in Shannon.
articles.content:
Clare County Council has approved plans for an expansion to the Zimmer Biomet Ltd facility in Shannon.
A planning permission application for the works was submitted in November 2024 by the American company.

articles.description: Two of the groups are ferociously interesting this weekend, two of them less so. Here, for one last time, are the permutations for the All-Ireland SFC group phase
articles.content:
Roll up, roll up for the annual permutations primer ahead of the final round of the group stage.

articles.title: Upcoming Road Diet on Station Street and City Road to Enhance Safety and Active Transportation in Saint John
articles.description: In 2025, Station Street and City Road, stretching from Smythe Street to just east of the Stanley Street pedestrian bridge, will undergo a road diet, transforming the current four-lane roadway into a more efficient and accessible space for all users. This project will convert the existing four vehicle lanes into three, introducing dedicated bike lanes on both sides of the road alongside the curb.

articles.title: Mediacorp fires male employee found behaving suspiciously in female toilet of office building
